entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
